name: PiggeryJokery
description:
"PiggeryJokery" Author: catventure (c)2002. Updated Dec 2018.

This adventure game is text only and of the traditional sort. It is similar to the old Infocom/Magnetic Scrolls/Level 9 type which were popular in the mid 1980`s.

It is also similar to popular 80's 8-bit text adventures created with the QUILL, PAW or GAC adventure utilities.

There are no pictures, sounds, or animations in this game.

In this game, because of your transgressions, you have become the victim of an enchantment and transformed into a little pink piglet.

Your quest, dear adventurer, should you decide to accept it, is to guide Peregrine Piglet through Tophole Wood, helping his fellow creatures who may be in need of his assistance and thus, completing the NINE noble tasks of kindness to lift the enchantment.
Peregrine will need to avoid woodland dangers, hostile beasts and humans. He must make new friends, overcome obstacles, solve problems, manipulate objects and act upon information to make progress. He must score 100 points to solve the game.
If the going gets a little tough remember you may type HELP  for some ideas or INFO for system commands. Good Luck and Happy Adventuring!

The game was updated by catventure in December 2018 using the free TAB retro text adventure and interactive fiction maker for Windows. More information and download here:

http://tab.thinbasic.com
